name: All-New Fire HD 8 Tablet, 8 HD Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers, Blue

reviews.reviews.text: Loved the Fire HD7 but the latest HD8 is sharper, faster and still handles great.
The best tablet for the price! All three of my children have one & they are worth it!
We have one for each of my children so I bought this one for my mother. They are amazing tablets especially for the price!
This my 2nd Kindle. I am so happy with it. The price was right and I could not resist buying another.
Amazon Fire tablets are the best products in their price ranges, especially if they are on sale as they were at the last Black Friday event. Excellent purchase.

I liked it at first except the browser is kind of clunky. Also you can. It use all android Apps. The worst thing though was mine just stopped working in the middle of watching a movie on a long plane flight. It was fully charged. I have tried recharging and turning on etc. it is just a blank screen and off. Kind of a cool paperweight. Hope I can get my money back. Or get a new one.
This 8 inch Fire is definitely better than the cheaper 7 inch. It works fine enough for teens to play games and watch movies.
Tablet is perfect for beginners who just want basic

The Fire HD8 strikes an excellent balance between performance and price. It has many of the features you'd want in a tablet for a fraction of the cost. Works flawlessly for reading and video streaming.
My 76 year old mom loves this! She now has something to do while waiting in doctors offices - loves to read, do crosswords, etc.
The Kindle is a great way to read and watch videos with ease!
It a great product..,. The quality is awesome the pictures is good and clear...

I purchased the kindle fire because I needed a entertainment only device for long flights. This device is the perfect size for travel and easy to use and set up with your Amazon account. It is worth purchasing a Fire tablet if you are an Amazon Prime member. If not, I would not recommend it because the available apps are limited . My only complaint about this device is that if it freezes it is difficult to reset.
Exciting tablet still amazed by the ease of use great product all in all
very satisfied with tablet, very fast and efficient
Purchased as a gift for my nephew He's was very happy with this item no complaints
It was a gift for my granddaughter and she seems very happy with it so far.

I bought this tablet to be pretty much exclusively an e-reader. It's actually cheaper than most of the kindles. For that limited use, it works fine. I don't think I would want to use it as a general purpose table (too slow!). Makes a fine e-reader though. As for recommending this to a friend, I would, but would make sure they knew what I use it for.
Nice size screen easy and light weight to take to class
Bought this as a gift. My mother likes it. It's easy and simple to use.
Purchase for a 12 year old. Sturdy, easy to usr. Great price
Love my mine! Works great with prime! And I have all my best movies!

We bought this Fire HD to replace an older model and the kids love it. Ease of use and the integration with Amazon Prime makes the product worth every moment. It is mostly used to watch movies and play some games so it works well for what is needed. Great for the price but if you need more options as far as productivity goes you may want to stick with an iPad or Galaxy Tab.
This was a gift and they love it! Its compact, they can surf the web, play games check emails etc

Light to carry and good picture quality. This was purchased for a hearing impaired person to download video in American Sign Language . This product was easy to maneuver for someone that was not use to a tablet.
She loves to use it to watch Netflix and play games

I bought this for my dad in his late 60s mainly to listen to music and read ebooks borrowed from the library. I set it up for him and he loves it. I just don't like that it has ads on the start up unless you pay to get rid of them.
I enjoy it more then the I-pad that its replacing. Easy to read in any light and the size is perfect for travel.
Perfect gift for the office co-workers or close friends
You can't beat the price. Great deal for what you're paying.

I really enjoy reading. So much so I was running out of shelf space. I have read a few books with my I-pad mini but it really didn't do the trick. No so with my new Amazon Fire Hd-8. Handy sized, not the least bit heavy and super bright. Add in the face that digital material from magazines to novels are often as not far cheaper that "hard copies".
I purchased it for my dad (70)He needed something easy to use. He really enjoys it.
Upgraded my tablet to hd, previous owned the 7" regular. I wanted a tablet so my grandkids can use instead of using my ipad. A great xmas gift.
good value for the money, love the kindle for reading
This tablet is great, and it has a good battery life. I'd recommend for people who love to read.
Works better than the 7" Amazon Fire tablet I have. Better screen, faster processor and bigger to boot.
Mom loves the tablet. Easy for her to use, she uses it for Facebook, reading, and some of her games.
Great tablet for under $100. Does not have the highest specs, but gets the job done for lite tablet users.
I like it a lot, it works well for everything I need. I would like a bigger selection of apps.
Easy to use tablet. Good price. Great for beginners as well as intermediate users. Fun!
Great product simple easy to understand great value!!!!
This has a great picture, good size, lots of storage and a camera. Would recommend
This tablet is great and easy to use. Great way to keep the kids entertain.

My original Kindle Fire no longer accepted a charge. I wasn't going to replace it, because I bought an iPad. When I saw the HD8 in a kiosk in a BB store, I realized how much better I liked the size and feel of it for reading books (the iPad is preferred for other things). This Fire's clarity is much improved over my old one, plus it responds better. I don't like that I can't choose a photo for the locked screen - that it HAS to be an advertisement. I also don't like that it usually takes a few trys to unlock. Menial issues from my perspective.
i was surprised buy how light and compact this was but still strong enough to do what i needed.

I bought this as a Christmas present for my sister and she LOVES it. It's easy to use, lightweight and doesn't seem to have a lot of bugs or glitches. It's a good source of entertainment for when she's at work but has down-time. She passes the time reading ebooks, browsing the web and playing games.
Purchased this Kindle Fire HD8 from Best Buy. My fianc√© downloaded her first book. She already started reading and said it is really cool to use. She said it is easy to see and navigate.
for the price this is a great works well the for the price display is hd love it
Great for reading. Ordering books and use as a tablet.
I wanted a new kindle fir a while. The price was right
I really enjoy using this tablet it runs very well

This tablet is the best one we've ever bought. And, the least expensive! It satisfies all of our needs; email, Facebook, Candy Crush, YouTube, Bluetooth broadcasting to a remote speaker. We love it. No frustration whey using the keyboard or finger clicking on icons or commands!

Purchased mainly to use travelling so haven't really had the opportunity to give it a fair road test at this point. It was advertised as capable of downloading movies and books so you can watch/read while travelling without burning through your data or being hit with data roaming fees or having to purchase wifi during flights.
Owned a kindle fire HDX for GameCircle years. Finally decided Goodreads upgrade. This fire HD 8 is great. Really Prime the larger screen and new features.
It does everything my kids need without having to pay a ridiculous price.
Great tablet other than the photo image quality is fuzzy and not the best.

I brought this tablet during the Black Friday sale fast forward to Christmas when my 6 year opens it he was happy I set it up for him two days later it crashed never came back on. Blank screen. He was disappointed and so was I .

I purchased this tablet for my mother, but I set it up and tested it out. It is super fast! I have the original Kindle Fire and all I can say is Amazon has come a long way! The new Fire HD8 is so much better than the original! I like it so much that I am thinking of purchasing one for myself! I would highly recommend this tablet to anyone!
This tablet is great for my son. Would be nice if it had a little more horsepower
Just what my wife wanted and needed she loved it! It is easy to use and simple to set up!
The kindle is great not only is it a reader its bascially a computer. It connects to the internet it takes pictures and has many other great features.
I absolutely love my kindle 8! Great picture, storage & sound. Can't live without my kindle!
Very happy with this purchase, it was exactly what I was looking for

I purchased 2 of these FIre HD tablets as gifts. They pack a lot of punch for the price. I helped set them up so I was able to get an idea of how they are going to work. The screen was very nice and clear. Speed of tablet was good. It is easy to use. If you are already in the Amazon family through prime it is a no-brainer.I don't believe you can get a better tablet at this price point.

This was replacement for my wife's original iPad and broken Kindle Paperwhite. She loves it, as it does basically everything both of the previous devices did in one unit that is easy to use, has good battery life, very nice screen resolution and good size for her. Great value, especially compared to an iPad.

Bought a Fire HD 8 tablet for my wife. She doesn't like using computers and avoids smartphones, but her new tablet is a big hit. She uses it to play games and to stream movies and radio programs. I use it for everything else -- reading news, checking e-mail, online shopping, etc. It was very easy to set up and even easier to use. Plenty of speed and capacity to do everything we want.

The Parental Options need some work. You can't even log in to a child account until you have Apps loaded for them to use. Also a kid's login doesn't have access to pre-loaded apps (like the calculator). Seems really odd to me that you can't give them access to basic functionality of the tablet.Otherwise, the tablet itself works great.
